code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant PlayerA as Player A
    participant PlayerB as Player B / Rival
    participant NarrativeEngine as Narrative Engine (Infra_IngressController)
    participant ContestCoordinator as Contest Coordinator
    participant Temporal as Temporal Check Runner
    participant CompQueue as Shared Complication Queue
    participant NarrativeWeaver as Narrative Weaver
    participant WebUI as Web UI Shell
    participant Admin as Admin Console

    PlayerA->>NarrativeEngine: Utterance + context (Infra_IngressController)
    PlayerB->>NarrativeEngine: Utterance + context (Infra_WorkerNode)
    NarrativeEngine->>NarrativeEngine: Detect collision hints (Infra_IngressController)
    NarrativeEngine->>ContestCoordinator: intent.checkRequest (Infra_WorkerNode)
    NarrativeEngine->>ContestCoordinator: intent.checkRequest (Infra_IngressController)
    ContestCoordinator->>ContestCoordinator: Wait 8s/2 turns for matching hints
    ContestCoordinator->>ContestCoordinator: Create contestId + contestSeed
    ContestCoordinator->>Temporal: contest.bundle (Infra_WorkerNode)

    loop For each participant
        Temporal->>Temporal: Spawn contest.check child workflow
        Temporal->>Temporal: Derive dice seed hash(Infra_EtcdCluster)
        Temporal->>Temporal: Resolve roll + modifiers
        Temporal-->>ContestCoordinator: contest.checkResult (Infra_EtcdCluster)
    end

    ContestCoordinator->>ContestCoordinator: Rank results (Infra_EtcdCluster)
    ContestCoordinator->>CompQueue: Upsert shared complications
    ContestCoordinator->>NarrativeWeaver: contest.resolution (Infra_RedisCache)
    ContestCoordinator->>Admin: telemetry.contest.start/resolved (Infra_RedisCache)

    NarrativeWeaver->>WebUI: Contested turn packet (Infra_RedisCache)
    NarrativeWeaver->>Admin: contest.override hooks + safety flags
    WebUI->>PlayerA: Display contested badge + breakdown
    WebUI->>PlayerB: Display contested badge + breakdown

    Admin-->>NarrativeWeaver: moderation.decision (Infra_LoadBalancer)
    NarrativeWeaver-->>WebUI: Updated contest narration (Infra_RedisCache)
